name: gel-grid
description: A flexible code implementation of the GEL Grid

scripts.test: node-sass test/test.scss test/test.css --output-style=expanded --sourcemap=none && diff -u test/test-expected.css test/test.css
scripts.dist: node-sass src/gel-grid.scss dist/gel-grid.min.css --output-style=compressed --sourcemap=none && node-sass src/gel-grid.scss dist/gel-grid.css --output-style=expanded --sourcemap=none

author: BBC
